name: 6-deoxotyphasterol,NADPH---hemoprotein reductase:oxygen oxidoreductase (typhasterol-forming)
definition: 6-Deoxotyphasterol + 2 Oxygen + 2 [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] <=> Typhasterol + 3 H2O + 2 [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]
comment: possibly two-step reaction (similar to R10669, R07450+R07451)
